Commands.One Ilm Punch: 5-hit melee BRV attackHigh turn rateAbilities become Holy BRV attack, Wind BRV attack after use
Commands.Spinning Attack: Group melee BRV attackHigh turn rateAbilities become Fire Holy BRV attack, Wind BRV attack after use
Commands.BRV Attack+: Melee BRV attack.High turn rate.Lasts for 5 turns after using Spinning Attack.
Commands.HP Attack+: Self: Gains BRV based on ATK.HP attack.High turn rate.Lasts for 5 turns after using Spinning Attack.
Commands.Nullifying Dropkick: 4-HIT BRV+HP attack.Ignores Defense.BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 200% of Max BRV.Extends all buffs granted by self by 5 turns.Grants Medium Max BRV Up if the LB2 Passive Ability is learned.

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Ability Attack Bonus: Raises BRV Damage by 10% when using abilities continuously.
Artifacts.Mighty One Ilm Punch: Raises BRV Damage dealt by One Ilm Punch by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Spinning Attack: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Spinning Attack by 10%.

Passives.One Ilm Punch Charge: Increases the max uses of One Ilm Punch by 1.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.High Tension: Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Spinning Attack Charge: Increases the max uses of Spinning Attack by 1.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Ability Speed High: Slightly reduces action delay when using abilities continuously.
Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Combo Blitzer: Slightly raises BRV damage when using abilities continuously.
Passives.Buff Boost: Moderately raises MAX BRV with active buffs
Passives.One-Ilm Punch Extension: One-Ilm Punch use +1 Slight One-Ilm Punch damage boost Moderately increased melee BRV damage, slightly increased Holy magic BRV for Howling Fist: Transfixion Moderately increased melee BRV damage, slightly increased Fire Holy magic BRV for Howling Fist: FusionUpon using One-Ilm Punch: Howling Fist: Transfixion, Backhand Blow: Detonation become Howling Fist: Transfixion+, Backhand Blow: Detonation+ (trigger additional HP attack)
Passives.Buffed Attack: Moderately raises ATK with active buffs
Passives.Spinning Attack Extension: Spinning Attack use +1 Slight Spinning Attack damage boost Moderately increased melee BRV damage, slightly increased Wind magic BRV for Backhand Blow: DetonationUpon using Spinning Attack: Howling Fist: Fusion, Backhand Blow: Detonation become Howling Fist: Fusion+, Backhand Blow: Detonation+ (trigger additional HP attack)

Weapons.Sphairai CP: 35: Increases the potency of Spin Attack and Backhand Blow.Moderately raises Spin Attack's BRV damage when there is only one target.Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Physical Attack Up for 5 turns after using Spin Attack.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ and HP Attack to HP Attack+ for 5 turns after using Spin Attack.
Weapons.Koenigs Knuckle CP: 15: Increases the potency of One Ilm Punch and Howling Fist.
